subject: New Pro Plus load cell adjustment
description_text:
Hi, I recently purchased a new set of Pro Plus pedals and everything is good apart from the brake pedal. I have to adjust the deadzone to 14% to stop it registering any movement after calibration. After watching Youtube videos of how to adjust the loadcell with an allen key theese new pedals have a white plastic covering and are different. Can you provide me a pdf manual or advice on how to adjust the loadcell.

Thanks, Ryan.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Dallat, You can refer to this PlusX user manual, and you're also welcome to share a video — we’ll help you check and troubleshoot the issue.  https://cdn.simsonn.vip/download/SIMSONN_Plus_X_EN.pdf
